mapper.insert:
insert into online_examination
student_id,
paper_id,
question_id,
examintion_result,
examintion_score,
examintion_answer,

mapper.select: select count(1) from online_examination where student_id = #{studentId} and paper_id = #{paperId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and question_id = #{questionId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
